fields.question_text: Ikinyabiziga cyose cyangwa ibinyabiziga bigenda bigomba kugira:
fields.choice3_text: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri

fields.question_text: Ijambo “akayira” bivuga inzira nyabagendwa ifunganye yagenewe usa:
fields.choice3_text: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri

fields.question_text: Umurongo uciyemo uduce umenyesha ahegereye umurongo ushobora kuzuzwa n’uturanga gukata tw’ibara ryera utwo turanga cyerekezo tumenyesha :
fields.choice3_text: Igabanurwa ry’umubare w’ibisate by’umuhanda mu cyerekezo bajyamo

fields.question_text: Ahantu ho kugendera mu muhanda herekanwa n’ibimenyetso bimurika ibinyabiziga ntibishobora kuhagenda :
Ibinyabiziga bikurikira bigomba gukorerwa isuzumwa buri mwaka:
fields.choice1_text: Ibinyabiziga bigenewe gutwara abagenzi muri rusange
fields.choice2_text: Ibinyabiziga bigenewe gutwara ibintu birengeje toni 3.5

fields.question_text: Ubugari bwa romoruki ikuruwe n’ikinyamitende itatu ntibugomba kurenza ibipimo bikurikira:
Uburebure bw’ibinyabiziga bikurikira ntibugomba kurenga metero 11 :
fields.choice2_text: Ibifite imitambiko ibiri ikurikiranye mu bugari bwayo

fields.question_text: Ikinyabiziga kibujijwe guhagarara akanya kanini aha hakurikira :
fields.choice1_text: Ahatarengeje metero 1 imbere cyangwa inyuma y’ikinyabiziga gihagaze akanya gato cyangwa kanini
fields.choice3_text: Aho abanyamaguru banyura mu muhanda ngo bakikire inkomyi

fields.question_text: Kunyuranaho bikorerwa:
Icyapa cyerekana umuvuduko ntarengwa ikinyabiziga kitagomba kurenza gishyirwa gusa ku binyabiziga bifite uburemere ntarengwa bukurikira:
Ahatari mu nsisiro umuvuduko ntarengwa mu isaha wa velomoteri ni:
Umuyobozi ugenda mu muhanda igihe ubugari bwawo budatuma anyuranaho nta nkomyi ashobora kunyura mu kayira k’abanyamaguru ariko amaze kureba ibi bikurikira:

Ku byerekeye kwerekana ibinyabiziga n’ukumurika kwabyo ndetse no kwerekana ihindura ry’ibyerekezo byabyo. Birabujijwe
gukora andi matara cyangwa utugarurarumuri uretse ibitegetswe ariko ntibireba amatara akurikira:
Ibinyabiziga bikoreshwa nka tagisi, bitegerereza abantu mu nzira nyabagendwa, bishobora gushyirwaho itara ryerekana ko ikinyabiziga kitakodeshejwe. Iryo tara rishyirwaho ku buryo bukurikira:
fields.choice1_text: Ni itara ry’icyatsi rishyirwa imbere ku kinyabiziga
fields.choice4_text: A na C ni ibisubizo by’ukuri

fields.question_text:
Birabujijwe kugenza ibinyabiziga bigendeshwa na moteri naza romoruki zikururwa nabyo, iyo ibiziga byambaye inziga zidahagwa cyangwa inziga zikururuka zifite umubyimba uri hasi ya cm
4. Ariko ibyo ntibikurikizwa kubinyabiziga bikurikira:
fields.choice1_text: Ku binyabiziga by’ingabo bijya ahatarenga km25

fields.question_text:
Ibimenyetso bimurika byerekana uburyo bwo kugendera mu muhanda kw'ibinyabiziga bishyirwa iburyo bw'umuhanda. Ariko bishobora no
gushyirwa ibumoso cyangwa hejuru y’umuhanda:
fields.choice2_text: Hakurikijwe icyo ibyo bimenyetso bigamije kwerekana

fields.question_text: Ni iyihe feri ituma imodoka igenda buhoro kandi igahagarara ku buryo bwizewe bubangutse kandi nyabwo, uko imodoka yaba yikoreye kose yaba igeze ahacuramye cyangwa ahaterera:

Ibizirikisho by’iminyururu cyangwa by’insinga kimwe n’ibindi by’ingoboka bikoreshwa gusa igihe nta kundi umuntu yabigenza kandi nta kindi bigiriwe uretse gusa kugirango ikinyabiziga kigere aho kigomba gukorerwa kandi nturenze na rimwe km 20 mu isaha, ibyo bizirikisho bigaragazwa ku buryo bukurikira:
fields.choice3_text: Icyapa cyera cya mpande enye zingana gifite cm 20 kuri buri ruhande

fields.question_text: Uretse mu mujyi, ku yindi mihanda yajyenwe na minisitiri ushinzwe gutwara abantu n’ibintu, uburemere ntarengwa ku binyabiziga bifite imitambiko itatu cyangwa irenga hatarimo makuzungu ni :

Ubugari bw’imizigo yikorewe n’ibinyamitende itatu n’ubwiyikorewe n’ibinyamitende 4 bifite cyangwa bidafite moteri kimwe n’ubw’iyikorewe na romuruki zikuruwe n’ibyo binyabiziga ntibushobora kurenga ibipimo bikurikira:
fields.choice1_text: cm 30 ku bugari bw’icyo kinyabiziga kidapakiye
fields.choice2_text: Ubugari ntarengwa budakuka ni metero 2 na sentimetero 50
fields.choice3_text: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri

fields.question_text:
Iyo bwije kugeza bukeye cyangwa bitewe n’uko ibihe bimeze nk’igihe cy’ibihu cyangwa cy’imvura bitagishoboka kubona neza muri m 200, udutsiko twose tw’abanyamaguru nk’imperekerane cyangwa udutsiko
tw’abanyeshuri bari ku murongo bayobowe n’umwarimu, iyo bagenda mu muhanda ku isonga hakaba hari abantu barenze umwe bagomba kugaragazwa kuburyo bukurikira :
fields.choice1_text: Imbere ni itara ry’umuhondo ritwariwe ibumoso
fields.choice2_text: Inyuma ni itara ryera ritwariwe ibumoso n’umuntu uri ku murongo w’inyuma hafi y’umurongo ugabanya umuhanda mo kabiri
fields.choice3_text: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri

fields.question_text:
Iyo ikinyabiziga gifite amatara abiri cyangwa menshi y’ubwoko bumwe ayo matara agomba kugira ibara rimwe n’ingufu zingana kandi akagomba gushyirwaho ku buryo buteganye
uhereye ku murongo ugabanya ikinyabizigamo
kabiri mu burebure bwacyo. Ariko ibi ntibikurikizwa ku matara akurikira:
fields.choice3_text: itara ribonesha icyapa kiranga numero y’ikinyabiziga inyuma

fields.question_text:
Buri modoka cyangwa buri romoruki ikuruwe n’iyo modoka bishobora kugira itara risa n’icyatsi kibisi bituma umuyobozi yerekana ko yabonye
ikimenyetso cy’uwitegura kumunyuraho. Iryo tara rigomba gushyirwa aha hakurikira:

Ibinyabiziga bihinga n’ibindi bikoresho byihariye bikoreshwa n’ibigo bipatana imirimo, iyo bigenda mu nzira nyabagendwa igihe cya nijoro cyangwa bitewe n’uko ibihe bimeze bitagishoboka kubona neza muri m 200 bishobora kugaragazwa inyuma n’amatara 2 atukura, bipfa kuba bitarenza ibipimo bikurikira:
fields.choice1_text: kutarenza umuvuduko wa km20 mu isaha
fields.choice2_text: uburebure bwabyo habariwemo ibyo bitwaye bukaba butarengeje m6
fields.choice4_text: A na B nibyo bisubizo by’ukuri

fields.question_text:
Iyo romoruki iziritse ku kinyamitende,
velomoteri n’amapikipiki bidafite akanyabiziga ko kuruhande uretse ikinyamitende na velomoteri bidafite umuyobozi, iyo uburumbarare bwayo cyangwa bw’ibyo yikoreye bituma itara ry’ikinyabiziga gikurura ritagaragara igihe bitagishoboka kubona neza muri m 200 bigomba
kugaragazwa ku buryo bukurikira:
fields.choice1_text: itara ryera cyangwa ry’umuhondo cyangwa risa n’icunga rihishije riri kuri rumoruki inyuma
fields.choice2_text: itara ry’icyatsi cyangwa ry’umuhondo cyangwa risa n’icunga rihishije riri kuri rumoruki inyuma
fields.choice3_text: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri

fields.question_text: Ikinyabiziga cyangwa ibinyabiziga bikururana bifite imitambiko ibiri ikurikiranye mu bugari bwayo ni ukuvuga imitambiko yihindukiza kucyo ifungiyeho, uburebure bwabyo ntibugomba kurenza ibipimo bikurikira:

Bumwe muri ubu bwoko bwa feri ituma imodoka iguma aho iri uko yaba yikoreye kose ku muzamuko cyangwa ku gacuri bya 16%, imyanya ya feri igomba gufata igakomeza kwegera kuburyo bw’ibyuma niyo umuyobozi yaba atarimo:

Amatara maremare y’ibara ryera cyangwa ry’umuhondo agomba, nijoro igihe ijuru rikeye, kumurika mu muhanda mu ntera ya m 100 nibura imbere y’ikinyabiziga, ariko ku binyabiziga bifite
moteri itarengeje za sentimetero kibe 125 iyo ntera igira ibipimo bikurikira:

Iyo banyuze iruhande rw’inkomyi abanyamaguru bagomba gukikira banyuze mu muhanda, abayobozi bagomba gusiga umwanya ufite ubugari bwa m 1 nibura hagati yabo nayo. Iyo ibyo bidashobora kubahirizwa kandi umunyamaguru akaba anyura hafi yiyo nkomyi, umuyobozi agomba kuyikikira afite umuvuduko utarengeje ibipimo bikurikira:

Amatara ndangambere n’aya ndanganyuma y’imodoka zitarengeje m 6 z’uburebure na m 2 z’ubugari habariwemo imitwaro kdi nta kinyabiziga kindi kiziritseho ashobora gusimburwa n’amatara akurikira, iyo ibyo binyabiziga bihagaze umwanya muto cyangwa munini mu nsisiro bibangikanye ku ruhande rw’umuhanda:

Iyo kuva bwije kugeza bukeye cyangwa bitewe nuko ibihe bimeze nk’igihe cy’igihu cyangwa cy’imvura bitagishoboka kubona neza muri m 200, imirongo y’ingabo z’igihugu zigendera kuri gahunda n’utundi dutsiko twose tw’abanyamaguru nk’imperekerane cyangwa udutsiko
tw’abanyeshuri bari ku murongo bayobowe na mwarimu, iyo bagenda mu muhanda ku isonga hakaba hari abantu barenze umwe, bagaragzwa ku buryo bukurikira:
fields.choice1_text: imbere ni itara ryera ritwariwe ku ruhande rw’ibumoso n’umuntu uri ku murongo w’imbere hafi y’umurongo ugabanya umuhanda mo kabiri
fields.choice2_text: inyuma ni itara umuhondo ritwariwe ku ruhande rw’ibumoso n’umuntu uri ku murongo w’inyuma hafi y’umurongo ugabanya umuhanda mo kabiri
fields.choice3_text: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri

fields.question_text: Nta tara na rimwe cyangwa utugarurarumuri bishobora kuba bifunze kuburyo igice cyabyo cyo hasi cyane kimurika kitaba kiri hasi ya cm 40 kuva ku butaka igihe ikinyabiziga kidapakiye ariko ibyo ntibikurikizwa ku matara akurikira:
fields.choice3_text: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri

fields.question_text: Ibinyabiziga bigendeshwa na moteri, hatarimo velomoteri n’ibinyabiziga bidapakiye umuvuduko wabyo udashobora kurenga km 50 mu isaha ahateganye bigomba kuba bifite ibikoresho by’ihoni byumvikanira mu ntera ikurikira:
Inkombe z’inzira nyabagendwa cyangwa z’umuhanda zishobora kugaragazwa n’ibikoresho ngarurarumuri. Ibyo bikoresho bigomba gushyirwaho ku buryo abagenzi babibona ku buryo bukurikira:
fields.choice1_text: babona iburyo bwabo ibyibara ritukura cyangwa ibisa n’icunga rihishije
fields.choice3_text: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri

fields.question_text:
Ahatari mu nsisiro, umuyobozi wese ugenza
ikinyabiziga kimwe cyangwa ibinyabiziga bikomatanye bifite uburemere ntarengwa bwemewe burenga ibiro 3500 cyangwa bifite uburebure bwite burenga metero 10 agomba, keretse iyo anyuze cyangwa agiye kunyura ku bindi binyabiziga, gusiga hagati y’ikinyabiziga cye n’iki muri imbere umwanya uhagije kugirango ibinyabiziga bimuhiseho bishobore kuhigobeka bidateje impanuka igihe bibaye ngombwa ariko ibyo ntibikurikizwa mu bihe bikurikira:
fields.choice1_text: mu gihe ibigendera mu muhanda ari byinshi kimwe no mu duce tw'inzira nyabagendwa aho kunyuranaho bibujijwe
fields.choice2_text: igihe ibigendera mu muhanda ari byinshi
fields.choice3_text: mu duce tw’inzira nyabagendwa aho kunyuranaho bibujijwe

fields.question_text: Ibiziga by’ibinyabiziga bigendeshwa na moteri n’ibya velomoteri kimwe n’ibya romoruki zabyo bigomba kuba byambaye inziga zihagwa zifite amano n’ubujyakuzimu butari munsi ya milimetero imwe ku migongo yabyo yose nubudodo bwabyo ntibugire ahantu na hamwe bugaragara kandi ntibugire aho byacitse bikomeye mu mpande zabyo ariko ibyo ntibikurikizwa ku binyabiziga bikurikira:
fields.choice1_text: ibinyabiziga bidapakiye kandi bitajya birenza umuvuduko wa km 25 mu isaha ahateganye
fields.choice2_text: ibinyabiziga bya police bijya ahatarenga km 25 uvuye aho biba
fields.choice3_text: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri

fields.question_text: Amahoni y’ibinyabiziga bigendeshwa na moteri agomba kohereza ijwi ry’injyana imwe rikomeza kandi ridacengera amatwi ariko ibinyabiziga bikurikira bishobora kugira ihoni ridasanzwe ridahuye n’ibivuzwe haruguru:
fields.choice4_text: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri

fields.question_text:
Amatara ndangacyerekezo agomba kuba agizwe n’ibintu bifashe ku rumuri rumyasa, biringaniye ku buryo bigira umubare utari
igiharwe ku mpande z’imbere n’inyuma z’ikinyabiziga ayo matara aba afite amabara akurikira:
fields.choice1_text: amatara y’imbere aba yera cyangwa ari umuhondo
fields.choice2_text: ayinyuma aba atukura cyangwa asa n’icunga rihishije
fields.choice3_text: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri

fields.question_text:
Imirongo y’ingabo z’igihugu zigendera kuri gahunda n’utundi dutsiko twose tw’abanyamaguru nk’imperekerane cyangwa udutsiko
tw’abanyeshuri iyo bitagishoboka kubona neza muri m200, bagaragazwa ni itara ryera imbere naho inyuma ni itara ry’umutuku ariko iyo uburebure bwiyo mirongo cyangwa bw’utwo dutsiko burenga m6 impande zatwo cyangwa zayo zigaragazwa ku buryo bukurikira:

Amatara ndangambere na ndanganyuma y’imodoka zitarengeje m 6 z’uburebure na m 2
z’ubugari habariwemo imitwaro kandi nta kindi kinyabiziga kiziritseho ashobora gusimburwa n’amatara yo guhagarara umwanya munini iyo ibyo binyabiziga bihagaze umwanya muto cyangwa munini mu nsisiro bibangikanye ku ruhande rw’umuhanda. Ayo matara arangwa n’amabara akurikira:
fields.choice3_text: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri

fields.question_text: Uretse ku byerekeye imihanda iromboreje y’ibisate byinshi n’imihanda yimodoka igice cy’umuhanda kiri hakurya y’umurongo mugari wera ucibwa ku muhanda ngo ugaragaze inkombe mpimbano zawo kigenewe ibi bikurikira:
Iyo bitagishoboka kubona muri m 200 imodoka zikuruwe n’inyamaswa, ingorofani, inyamaswa zitwaye imizigo cyangwa zigenderwamo kimwe n’amatungo bigomba kurangwa na :
fields.choice2_text: imbere ni itara ry’umuhondo cyangwa risa n’icunga rihishije

fields.question_text:
Uretse igihe hari amategeko yihariye akurikizwa muri ako karere ikinyabiziga cyose gihagaze umwanya muto cyangwa munini, iyo gihagaze mu mwanya wo kuruhande wagenewe abanyamaguru, kugirango bashobore kugenda batagombye kunyura mu muhanda, umuyobozi
agombye kubasigira akayira gafite byibura ibipimo bikurikira by’ubugari:
Iki cyapa gisobanura iki?
fields.choice1_text:
Ahegereye amasangano y’inzira nyabagendwa
n’inzira ya gari ya moshi ibambiye

fields.question_text: Iki cyapa gisobanura iki?
Icyapa gikoze mw’ishusho ya mpandeshatu kimenyesha:
Iki cyapa gisobanura :
fields.choice2_text: uburenganzira bwo gutambuka mbere mu yandi masangano y’umuhanda akwegereye
fields.choice3_text: ibyago imbere mu masangano y’umuhanda ukwegereye
fields.choice4_text: a na b ni ibisubizo by’ukuri

fields.question_text:
Ni ikihe cyapa muri ibi kintegeka gutanga
inzira:
Iki cyapa gisobanura :
fields.choice4_text: a na b ni bisubizo by’ukuri

fields.question_text: Ni ikihe cyapa cy’inyemerera gutambuka mbere mu masangano y’umuhanda?
Igihe ubonye icyapa kigaragaza ishuli wakora iki?
fields.choice2_text: gukomeza n’umuvuduko uri hejuru kuko umunyeshuli agomba gutegereza

fields.question_text: Icyapa kimenyesha kugendera mu muhanda ubisikanirwamo gifite:
fields.choice1_text: Ishusho y’uruziga mw’ibara ritukura, ubuso bwera n’ikirango cy’umukara
fields.choice2_text: Ishusho ya mpandeshatu mw’ibara ritukura, ubuso bwera n’ikirango cy’umukara
fields.choice3_text: Ishusho ya mpandeshatu mw’ibara ritukura, ubuso bw’ubururu n’ikirango cy’umukara
fields.choice4_text: Ishusho y’uruziga mw’ibara ritukura, ubuso bw’ubururu n’ikirango cy’umukara

fields.question_text:
Icyapa cyerekana inzira y’amatungo itegetswe
giteye:
fields.choice1_text: Uruziga mubuso bw’ubururu, ishusho y’inka mu ibara ry’umukara
fields.choice2_text: Uruziga mu ibara ryera, ishusho y’inka mwibara ry’ubururu
fields.choice3_text: Uruziga mu buso bw’ibara ry’ubururu, ishusho y’inka mu ibara ryera n’ikirango cy’umukara
fields.choice4_text: mpande eshatu	mu buso bw’ibara ry’umweru n’ishusho y’inka mu ibara ry’umukara

fields.question_text: Iki cyapa gisobanura iki ?
Muri ibi byapa bikurikira ni ikihe cyerekana ko umuyobozi ukibonye yemerewe gutambuka mbere y'abaturutse aho agana mu nzira ifunganye:
Iki cyapa:
Iki cyapa gisobanura iki ?
fields.choice2_text: Inkomane y’aho umuhanda umwe urasukira iburyo

fields.question_text: Icyapa cyerekana ko bibujijwe kuvuza amahoni kirangwa na :
fields.choice1_text: ishusho y’uruziga, ubuso bw’ubururu, ikiranga cy’umukara
fields.choice2_text: ishusho y’uruziga, ubuso bw’ubururu, ikiranga cy’umweru
fields.choice3_text: ishusho y’uruziga, ubuso bw’umweru, ikiranga cy’umukara

fields.question_text: Iyo nta mategeko awugabanya by’umwihariko umuvuduko ntarengwa w’amapikipiki mu isaha ni:
Uburyo bukoreshwa kugirango ikinyabiziga kigende gahoro igihe feri idakora neza babwita:
Amatara maremare y’ikinyabiziga agomba kuzimwa mu bihe bikurikira:
fields.choice1_text: Iyo umuhanda umurikiye umuyobozi abasha kureba muri metero 20

fields.question_text: Ikinyabiziga ntigishobora kugira amatara arenga abiri y’ubwoko bumwe keretse kubyerekeye amatara akurikira:
Ubugari bwa romoruki ikuruwe n’igare cyangwa velomoteri ntiburenza ibipimo bikurikira:
Itara ryo guhagarara ry’ibara ritukura rigomba kugaragara igihe ijuru rikeye nibura mu ntera ikurikira:
fields.choice1_text: Metero 100 ku manywa na metero 20 mu ijoro
fields.choice2_text: Metero 150 ku manywa na metero50 mu ijoro
fields.choice3_text: Metero 200 ku manywa na metero100 mu ijoro

fields.question_text:
Za otobisi zagenewe gutwara abanyeshuri
zishobora gushyirwaho amatara abiri asa n’icunga rihishije amyasa kugirango yerekane ko zihagaze no kwerekana ko bagomba kwitonda, ayo matara ashyirwaho ku buryo bukurikira :
fields.choice4_text: b na c ni ibisubizo by’ukuri

fields.question_text:
Icyapa kivuga gutambuka mbere
y’ibinyabiziga biturutse imbere gifite amabara akurikira:
Iyo kuyobya umuhanda ari ngombwa bigaragazwa kuva aho uhera no kuburebure bwawo n’icyapa gifite ubuso bw’amabara akurikira:

Ku mihanda ibyapa bikurikira bigomba
kugaragazwa ku buryo bumwe:
Icyapa kibuza kunyura kubindi binyabiziga byose uretse ibinyamitende ibiri n’amapikipiki adafite akanyabiziga ku ruhande gifite ibimenyetso by’amabara akurikira:
fields.choice4_text: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri

fields.question_text: Icyapa kivuga ko hatanyurwa mu byerekezo byombi kirangwa n’ubuso bw’ibara rikurikira:
Icyapa cyerekana ahantu hagenewe guhagararwamo n’imodoka nini zagenewe gutwara abantu cyirangwa n’ubuso bw’amabara akurikira:
Icyapa cyerekana ko inzira giteyeho mu ntangiriro idakomeza kigaragazwa n’ikirango (ikimenyetso) cy’amabara akurikira:
Icyapa cy’inyongera kigaragaza ikibanza cy’ingando cyangwa cy’abantu benshi bagendera ku nyamaswa kirangwa n’amabara akurikira:
Icyapa cyerekana ahantu amategeko y’ Umuhanda urombeje w’ibice byinshi atangirira gukurikizwa, kirangwa n’ibirango (ibimenyetso) by’amabara akurikira:
Igihe ikorwa ry’imirimo ribangamiye cyane cyangwa buke uburyo bwo kugenda mu nzira nyabagendwa, ahakorerwa imirimo hagaragazwa ku buryo bukurikira:
fields.choice1_text: icyapa cyera cya mpande enye, zingana zifite uruhande rwa metero 0.30
fields.choice3_text: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri

fields.question_text: Icyapa cyerekana ko hari amabwiriza yihariye mu buryo bwo kugendera mu cyambu cyangwa ku kibuga cy’indege giteye ku buryo bukurikira:
fields.choice1_text: ishusho mpandeshatu, ubuso mu ibara ryera, ikirango mu ibara ry’umukara
fields.choice2_text: ishusho mpandenye, ubuso mu ibara ry’ubururu n’ikirango kiri mu ibara ryera
fields.choice3_text: ishusho y’uruziga mu ibara ry’ubururu ni ikirango kiri mu ibara ryera

fields.question_text: Nibura ikinyabiziga gitegetswe kugira uduhanagurakirahure tungahe:
Iyo umuvuduko w’ibinyabiziga bidapakiye ushobora kurenga km50 mu isaha ahategamye, bigomba  kuba bifite ibikoresho by’ihoni byumvikanira mu ntera:
Igice cy'inzira nyabagendwa kigarukira ku mirongo ibiri yera icagaguye ibangikanye kandi gifite ubugari budahagije kugira ngo imodoka zitambuke neza, kiba ari:
Ubugari bwa romoruki ntiburenza ubugari bw’ikinyabiziga kiyikurura iyo ikuruwe n’ibinyabiziga bikurikira:

fields.question_text: Iyo hatarimo indi myanya birabujijwe gutwara ku ntebe y’imbere y’imodoka abana badafite imyaka:

fields.question_text: Inkombe z’inzira nyabagendwa cyangwa z’umuhanda zishobora kugaragazwa n’ibikoresho ngarurarumuri. Ibyo bikoresho bigomba gushyirwaho ku buryo abagenzi babibona :

fields.question_text: Iyo nta mategeko awugabanya by’umwihariko, umuvuduko ntarengwa ku modoka zitwara abagenzi mu buryo bwa rusange ni:

fields.question_text: Utuyira turi ku mpande z’umuhanda n’ inkengero zigiye hejuru iharirwa abanyamaguru mu bihe bikurikira:

fields.choice3_text: Iyo hatari amategeko yihariye yerekanwa n’ibimenyetso

fields.question_text: Imburira zimurika zemerewe gukoreshwa kugirango bamenyeshe umuyobozi ko bagiye kumunyuraho aha hakurikira:
Uburemere ntarengwa bwemewe ntibushobora kurenga ½ y’uburemere bw’ikinyabiziga gikurura nubw’umuyobozi kuri romoruki zikurikira :
Ibinyabiziga bifite ubugari bufite ibipimo bikurikira bigomba kugira amatara ndangaburumbarare :
Nta tara na rimwe cyangwa akagarurarumuri bishobora kuba bifunze ku buryo igice cyabyo cyo hasi cyane kimurika kitaba kiri hasi y’ibipimo bikurikira kuva ku butaka igihe ikinyabiziga kidapakiye :
Ahari hejuru cyane y’ubuso bumurika h’amatara ndangambere na ndanganyuma ntihashobora kuba aharenze ibipimo bikurikira hejuru y’ubutaka iyo ikinyabiziga kidapakiye:
Ni ryari ikinyabiziga gishobora kugenda mu muhanda moteri itaka cyangwa vitesi idakora:
Umurongo mugari wera udacagaguye ushobora gucibwa ku muhanda kugirango ugaragaze ibi bikurikira:
Ibinyabiziga bikurikira bigomba kugira icyerekana umuvuduko kiri aho umuyobozi areba neza kandi kigahora kitabwaho kugirango kigume gukora neza:
fields.choice1_text: ibinyabiziga bifite umuvuduko nibura wa km 60 mu isaha
fields.choice2_text: ibinyabiziga bishobora kurenza km 40 mu isaha
fields.choice3_text: ibinyabiziga bishobora kurenza km 30 mu isaha
fields.choice4_text: ibinyabiziga bishobora kurenza km 25 mu isaha

fields.question_text: Ubugari bw’imizigo yikorewe n’ipikipiki idafite akanyabiziga ko kuruhande kimwe n’ubwa romoruki ikuruwe na bene icyo kinyabiziga ntibushobora kurenza ibipimo bikurikira:
Ibinyabiziga bikurikira bigomba kugira itara ry’ubururu rimyatsa riboneka mu mpande zose:
fields.choice1_text: ibinyabiziga bifite ubugari burenga m 2 na cm 10

fields.question_text: Ku kinyabiziga cyangwa ibinyabiziga bikururana igice kirenga ku biziga ntikigomba kurenga ibipimo bikurikira:
fields.choice3_text: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri

fields.question_text: Iyo amatara y’ikinyabiziga agomba gucanwa kandi igihe imizigo isumba impera y’ikinyabiziga ho metero irenga igice gihera cy’imizigo kigaragazwa ku buryo bukurikira:
fields.choice1_text: itara ritukura cyangwa akagarurarumuri ku mutuku ku manywa
fields.choice2_text: agatambaro gatukura gafite nibura cm 50 z’uruhande mu ijoro

fields.question_text: Iyo imizigo igizwe n’ibinyampeke, ikawa, ipamba idatonoye, ibishara, ibyatsi, ibishami cyangwa ubwatsi bw’amatungo bidahambiriye uretse amapaki afunze, ubugari bwayo bushobora kugera ku bipimo bikurikira:
Uretse mu mijyi kuyindi mihanda yagenywe na minisiteri ushinzwe gutwara ibintu n’abantu, uburemere ntarengwa bwemewe ku binyabiziga bifatanye bifite imitambiko itatu ni:
Buri modoka cyangwa buri romoruki ikuruwe n’iyo modoka bishobora kugira itara rituma umuyobozi yerekana ko yabonye ikimenyetso cy’uwitegura kumunyuraho. Iryo tara rifite amabara akurikira:
Utugarurarumuri turi mu mbavu z’ikinyabiziga tugomba kugira ibara rikurikira:
Romoruki zifite ubugari ntarengwa bwa cm 80 zishobora gushyirwaho akagarurarumuri kamwe gusa iyo zikuruwe n’ibinyabiziga bikurikira:
Guhagarara akanya gato no guhagarara akanya kanini bibujijwe cyane cyane aha hakurikira:
fields.choice2_text: mu ruhande ruteganye n’urwo ikindi kinyabiziga gihagazemo akanya gato cyangwa kanini
fields.choice3_text: ku mihanda ibisikanirwamo, iyo ubugari bw’umwanya w’ibinyabiziga ugomba gutuma bibisikana butagifite m12

fields.question_text: Imizigo yikorewe n’amagare, velomoteri, amapikipiki, ibinyamitende by’ibiziga bitatu nibyo ibiziga bine bifite cyangwa bidafite moteri inyuma ntishobora kurenza ibipimo bikurikira:
Itara ndanganyuma rigomba gushyirwa aha hakurikira:
Iyo tumuritswe n’amatara y’urugendo y’i kinyabiziga utugarurarumuri tugomba n’ijoro, igihe ijuru rikeye kubonwa n’umuyobozi w’ikinyabiziga kiri mu ntera ikurikira:
Ahatari mu nsisiro ibyapa biburira n’ibyapa byo gutambuka mbere bigomba gushyirwa mu ntera ikurikira y’ahantu habyerekana:
Ibinyabiziga bikurikira bigomba kugira ibikoresho by’ihoni byumvikanira mu ntera ya m 20:
Amatara ndangaburumbarare agomba kubonwa nijoro igihe ijuru rikeye n’umuyobozi w’ikinyabiziga kiri mu ntera ya :
Ibimenyetso by’agateganyo bigizwe n’imitemeri y’ibara risa n’icunga rihishije bishobora gusimbura ibi bikurikira:
Buri modoka yagenewe gutwara abantu, ariko umubare wabo ntarengwa ukaba munsi ya 6 umuyobozi abariwemo igomba kugira imikandara yo kurinda ibyago igenewe aba bakurikira:
fields.choice3_text: ishobora no kugira imikandara kuzindi ntebe z’inyuma

fields.question_text: Usibye ibinyabiziga by'ingabo z'Igihugu, Ikinyabiziga kigendeshwa na moteri kiriho ibyuma ntamenwa cyangwa ikindi cyose gituma gikoreshwa mu gutera cyangwa mu kwitabara ntigishobora kugenda mu nzira nyabagendwa kidafite uruhushya rwihariye. Urwo ruhushya rutangwa naba bakurikira:

Iyo umukumbi ugizwe n’amatungo maremare arenze ane cyangwa amatungo magufi arenze atandatu mu nzira nyabagendwa iyo hatakibona neza kuburyo umuyobozi abona muri m 200 ugomba kugaragazwa kuburyo bukurikira:
fields.choice1_text: itara ry’urumuri rwera cyangwa rusa n’icunga rihishije imbere y’umukumbi
fields.choice2_text: itara ry’urumuri rutukura cyangwaumuhondo ritwawe inyuma y’umukumbi
fields.choice3_text: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri

fields.question_text: Ibinyabiziga biherekeranyije mu butumwa ntibishobora gutonda uburebure burenga umurongo wa m 500. Iyi bibaye bityo ibinyabiziga biherekeranye mu butumwa bishobora kugabanwamo amatsinda atonze umurongo atarengeje m 50 z’uburebure kdi hagati yayo hakaba byibura m 50 ariko ibyo ntibikurikizwa kubinyabiziga bikurikira:
fields.choice3_text: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri

fields.question_text: Iyo ikinyabiziga gikururwa n’inyamaswa nacyo gikuruye ikindi uburebure bw’ibikururwa bukaba burenga m 18 hatabariwemo icyo kinyabiziga cya mbere kiziritseho hagomba ibi bikurikira:
fields.choice3_text: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri

fields.question_text: Ibinyabiziga bikurikira ntibitegetswe kugira ibimenyetso bibyerekana iyo byambukiranya umuhanda cyangwa bigenda ku ruhande rwawo:
fields.choice3_text: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri

fields.question_text: Iyo mu muhanda, imirimo yihariye ubugari butuma abayobozi bagomba kuva mu mwanya wabo usanzwe kugirango bakomeze urugendo, ahategetswe kunyurwa hagaragazwa n’ikimenyetso gishyirwa aho imirimo irangirira mu ruhande rugenderwamo. Icyo kimenyetso kirangwa n’amabara akurikira:
fields.choice2_text: umuzenguruko w’umutuku, ubuso umweru n’ikirango cy’umukara
fields.choice3_text: umuzenguruko w’umutuku, ubuso mu ibara ryera, ikirango mu ibara ry’umutuku n’umukara

fields.question_text: Nijoro igihe ijuru rikeye, itara ribonesha icyapa kiranga numero y’ikinyabiziga rigomba gutuma izo numero zisomerwa nibura mu ntera ikurikira:
Birabujijwe kubangamira imigendere isanzwe y’ibindi binyabiziga kubera ibi bikurikira:
fields.choice2_text: gukacira feri bidatewe no kwirinda ibyago
fields.choice3_text: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri

fields.question_text: Iyo kuva bwije kugeza bukeye cyangwa bitewe n’uko ibihe bimeze bitagishoboka kubona neza muri m 200, mu nzira nyabagendwa, romoruki iziritse kuri velomoteri cyangwa ipikipiki idafite akanyabiziga ku ruhande, uretse velomoteri idafite umuyobozi, kandi uburumbarare bwayo, cyangwa bw’ibyo yikoreye bukaba butuma itara ry’ikinyabiziga biyikurura ritagaragara, iyo romoruki igaragazwa ku buryo bukurikira:
fields.choice1_text: itara ryera riri kuri romoruki inyuma
fields.choice2_text: itara ry’umuhondo riri kuri romoruki inyuma
fields.choice3_text: itara risa n’icunga riri kuri romoruki inyuma

fields.question_text: Amatara maremare y’ikinyabiziga agomba kuzimwa mu bihe bikurikira:
fields.choice1_text: iyo umuhanda umurikiwe hose kandi umuyobozi ashobora kubona nibura mu ntera ingana na metero 200
fields.choice2_text: iyo ikinyabiziga gikurikiye mu ntambwe zitagera muri m100 keretse iyo umuyobozi wacyo ashaka kunyura kucyo akurikiye acana azimya vuba vuba amatara maremare
fields.choice3_text: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri

fields.question_text: Iyo akanyabiziga gasunikwa cyangwa ibyo gatwaye bidatuma umuyobozi abona neza imbere ye, uwo muyobozi agomba gukora ibi bikurikira:
fields.choice3_text: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri

fields.question_text: Uretse igihe hari amategeko yihariye akurikizwa muri ako karere cyangwa imitunganyirize bwite y’aho, ikinyabiziga cyose cyangwa inyamaswa ihagaze umwanya muto cyangwa munini igomba kuba iri aha hakurikira:
fields.choice1_text: mu kaboko k’iburyo hakurikijwe aho yaganaga uretse igihe ari mu muhanda w’icyerekezo kimwe
fields.choice2_text: ahegereye bishobotse akayira k’abanyamaguru iyo umuhanda ugafite ariko umwanya w’ibiziga n’akayira ntube urenga santimetero 50
fields.choice3_text: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri

fields.question_text: Iyo ikinyabiziga gihagaritswe n’ijoro ku buryo abayobozi bakigana badashobora kumenya ko kibabereye imbogamizi, kigomba kurangirwa kure n’ikimenyetso cyabigenewe kiri ahantu hagaragara kugirango kiburire hakiri kare abandi bayobozi baza bagisanga, ariko ntibireba ibinyabiziga bikurikira:
fields.choice3_text: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri

fields.question_text: Abanyamaguru batatanye cyangwa bagize udutsiko tudafatanyije gahunda kdi batanayobowe n’umwarimu bategetswe kunyura mu tuyira turi ku mpande z’umuhanda no ku nkengero zigiye hejuru uretse ubutaka butsindagiye butandukanya imihanda ibiri bwo kunyurwamo gusa n’aba bakurikira:
fields.choice1_text: abanyamaguru bashaka guhagarara akanya gato igihe bambukiranya umuhanda
fields.choice3_text: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri

fields.question_text: Ibinyabiziga biherekeranyije mu butumwa ntibishobora gutonda uburebure burenga umurongo wa m 500, iyo bibaye bityo ibinyabiziga biherekeranyije mu butumwa bishobora kugabanywamo amatsinda atonze umurongo utarengeje ibipimo bikurikira:
Ibyapa byereka inkomane y’inzira nyabagendwa n’inzira ya gariyamoshi bigomba iteka kumurikwa cyangwa kugarura urumuri ku buryo bigaragarira nibura mu ntera ikurikira igihe ijuru rikeye:
Imbibi ziri ku mpera z’ubwihugiko bw’abanyamaguru kandi ziri mu muhanda kimwe n’imbibi n’ibindi bikoresho bigenewe gutuma bagenda mu muhanda nta muvundo zisigwa irangi ry’ibara rikurikira:
Kugirango ikinyabiziga kive ahantu hari urwondo cyangwa hanyerera bidasanzwe hashobora gukoreshwa uburyo bukurikira:
fields.choice2_text: inziga zishobora gushyirwaho iminyururu irwanya ubunyerere
fields.choice3_text: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri

fields.question_text: Iyo imizigo igizwe n’ibinyampeke, ikawa, amakara, ubwatsi bw’amatungo bidahambiriye, ubugari bwayo bushobora kugera kuri m2 na cm75 ariko iyo iyo mizigo ijyanwa mu karere katarenga km25 uvuye aho yapakiriwe, usibye mu nsisiro, ubugari bwayo bushobora kugera ku bipimo bikurikira:
Mu mujyi no ku mihanda y’igihugu igenwa na minisitiri ushinzwe gutwara abantu n’ibintu, ubwikorere ntarengwa ku ikamyo iyo ariyo yose ntibushobora kurenga ibipimo bikurikira:
Nijoro, amatara yo kubisikana y’ibara ryera cyangwa y’umuhondo agomba, igihe ijoro rikeye kumurika mu muhanda nibura mu ntera ikurikira:

Ikintu cyose cyatuma hahindurwa ibyanditse bireba nyirikarita cyangwa ibiranga ikinyabiziga kigomba kumenyeshwa ibiro by’umusoro haba mu magambo cyangwa mu ibaruwa ishinganye ibyo bikorwa mu gihe kingana gute:

Kugirango berekane ahantu habi cyane, hakoreshwa ikimenyetso cy’itara ry’umuhondo rimyasa, rivuga uburenganzira bwo gutambuka icyo kimenyetso barushijeho kwitonda. Ese icyo kimenyetso gihindura iki ku mategeko agenga gutambuka mbere:
fields.choice3_text: abatwaye ibinyabiziga binini nibo batambuka mbere

fields.question_text: Romoruki zifite ubugari ntarengwa bwa sentimetero 80 zishobora gushyirwaho akagarurarumuri kamwe gusa iyo zikuruwe n’ibinyabiziga bikurikira:
Amatara maremare y’ibara ryera cyangwa ry’umuhondo agomba nijoro igihe ijuru rikeye kumurika mu ntera ikurikira ku binyabiziga bifite moteri itarengeje ingufu zigera kuri sentimetero kibe 125

Iyo kuva bwije kugeza bukeye cyangwa bitewe n’uko ibintu bimeze bitagishoboka kubona muri m 200, ibinyabiziga cyangwa imitwaro bifite ubugari burenga m 2.50 iyo bigenda mu nzira nyabagendwa bigaragazwa ku buryo bukurikira:
fields.choice2_text: iyo bibaye ngombwa no ku mpera y’amabondo y’ikinyabiziga cyangwa y’imitwaro ni itara ndangaburumbarare risa n’icunga rihishije cyangwa ry’umuhondo
fields.choice3_text: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri

fields.question_text: Igice cy’umuhanda kiri hakurya y’umurongo mugari wera udacagaguye ugaragaza inkombe mpimbano y’umuhanda kiba kigenewe ibi bikurikira:
fields.choice2_text: guhagararwamo umwanya muto n’umunini ndetse no kumihanda irombereje y’ibisate byinshi n’imihanda y’imodoka
fields.choice3_text: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri

fields.question_text: Iminyururu n’ibindi byuma bifashisha bishobora kuvanwaho cyangwa binagana, hatabariwemo ibimenyetso byerekana ibyerekezo bigomba gutungurwa ku kinyabiziga ku buryo igihe byizunguza bitarenga impande zihera uburumbarare bw’ikinyabiziga kandi ibyo byuma bifashisha ntibigomba gukururuka ku butaka ariko ibyo ntibibujijwe ku binyabiziga bikurikira:
fields.choice2_text: ibinyabiziga bitwaye ibintu bidashobora gufata inkongi
fields.choice3_text: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri

fields.question_text: Ku binyabiziga cyangwa ibinyabiziga bikururana igice kirenga ku biziga ntigishobora kurenga ibipimo bikurikira:
fields.choice3_text: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri

fields.question_text: .Uretse bibonewe uruhushya, ubundi birabujijwe gushyira no gukomeza kugendesha imodoka cyangwa romoruki mu nzira nyabagendwa iyo uburemere bw’ibyikorewe burenze uburemere ntarengwa bwemewe n’ikarita iranga ikinyabiziga ariko ibyo ntibikurikizwa ku binyabiziga bikurikira:

Gushyira mu muhanda ku buryo budasanzwe ibinyabiziga bikururana birenze bitatu bigomba gutangirwa uruhusa, uretse imashini ihinga iyo zigenda uregendo rutarenze km 25, ibinyabiziga bikururana bitwaye ibyamamazwa n’ibindi biteganwa n’iri teka ariko igiteranyo cy’uburebure bw’ibyo binyabiziga bikururana ntigishobora kurenga ibipimo bikurikira:
Ibinyamitende itatu bifite moteri bigomba kugira amatara akurikira:
fields.choice1_text: amatara abiri ndangambere n’amatara abiri ndanganyuma yerekana ko ikinyabiziga gihagaze
fields.choice3_text: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri

fields.question_text: Umurongo w’umuhondo ucagaguye uciye ku nkombe nyayo y’umuhanda, umusezero w’inzira y’abanyamaguru cyangwa w’inkengero y’umuhanda yegutse uvuga ibi bikurikira:
fields.choice1_text: guhagarara umwanya muto birabujijwe ku burebure bw’uwo murongo
fields.choice2_text: guhagarara umwanya muto n’umunini birabujijwe ku burebure bw’uwo murongo
fields.choice3_text: aho bahagarara umwanya munini cyangwa muto

fields.question_text: Ku binyabiziga cyangwa ibinyabiziga bikururana igice kirenga ku biziga ntigishobora kurenga ibipimo bikurikira:
fields.choice3_text: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri

fields.question_text: Mu migi no ku yindi mihanda y’igihugu igenwa na minisitiri ushinzwe gutwara abantu n’ibintu uburebure ntarengwa kuri buri mitambiko 3 ifungwaho ibiziga bine ni:

Iyo hagati y’uruhande rw’imbere rwa romoruki n’uruhande rw’inyuma rw’ikinyabiziga kiyikurura hari umwanya urenze m 3 ikibizirikanyije kigomba kugaragazwa ku buryo bukurikira iyo amatara y’ikinyabiziga agomba gucanwa:
fields.choice1_text: agatambaro gatukura gafite nibura cm 50 z’uruhande
fields.choice2_text: itara risa n’icunga rihishije rigaragara mu mbavu igihe ikibizirikanyije kimuritswe
fields.choice3_text: A na B  ni ibisubizo by’ukuri

fields.question_text: Itara ryo guhagarara ry’ibara ritukura rigomba kuba ridahumisha, kandi rigomba kugaragarira mu ntera ikurikira:
fields.choice1_text: nijoro igihe ijuru rikeye nibura muri m 200
fields.choice2_text: ku manywa igihe cy’umucyo  nibura muri m50
fields.choice3_text: nijoro nibura muri m 100 igihe ijuru rikeye

fields.question_text: Birabujijwe kongera ku mpande z’ikinyabiziga kigendeshwa na moteri cyangwa velomoteri ibi bikurikira:
fields.choice2_text: ibintu bifite imigongo cyangwa ibirenga ku mubyimba kandi bishobora gutera ibyago abandi bagenzi
fields.choice3_text: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri

fields.question_text: Ikintu cyose cyatuma hahindurwa ibyanditswe bireba nyirikarita cyangwa ibiranga ikinyabiziga kigomba kumenyeshwa ibiro by’imisoro haba mu magambo cyangwa mu ibaruwa ishinganye. Ibyo bikorwa mu gihe kingana gute:
Kunyuranaho bikorerwa:
Iyo ubugari bw’inzira nyabagendwa igenderwamo n’ibinyabiziga budahagije kugirango bibisikane nta nkomyi abagenzi bategetswe:
Umuyobozi ugenda mu muhanda igihe ubugari bwawo budatuma anyuranaho nta nkomyi ashobora kunyura mu kayira k’abanyamaguru ariko amaze kureba ibi bikurikira:

Iyo nta mategeko awugabanya by’umwihariko, umuvuduko 
ntarengwa w’amapikipiki mu isaha ni:
Ahatari mu nsisiro umuvuduko ntarengwa wa velomoteri mu isaha ni:
Birabujijwe guhagarara akanya kanini aha hakurikira:
fields.choice3_text: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri

fields.question_text: Amatara maremare y’ikinyabiziga agomba kutamurika mu bihe bikurikira:
fields.choice1_text: iyo umuhanda umurikiwe umuyobozi abasha kureba muri m 200

fields.question_text: Ubugari bwa romoruki ikuruwe n’igare cyangwa velomoteri ntiburenza ibipimo bikurikira:
Uburyo bukoreshwa kugirango ikinyabiziga kigende gahoro igihe feri idakora neza bwitwa:
Nta mwanya n’umwe feri ifungiraho ushobora kurekurana n’ibiziga keretse:
fields.choice3_text: iyo bireba feri yo guhagarara umwanya munini, ubwo kurekurana bikaba bidashoboka bidakozwe n'umuyobozi

fields.question_text: Ikinyabiziga ntigishobora kugira amatara arenze abiri y’ubwoko bumwe keretse kubyerekeye amatara akurikira:
Itara ndanganyuma rigomba gushyirwa aha hakurikira:
Nibura ikinyabiziga gitegetswe kugira uduhanagurabirahuri dukurikira:

Ibiziga by’ibinyabiziga bigendeshwa na moteri n’ibya velomoteri kimwe n’ibya romoruki zabyo bigomba kuba byambaye inziga zihagwa zifite amano n’ubujyakuzimu butari munsi ya milimetero imwe ku migongo yabyo yose, n’ubudodo bwabyo ntibugire ahantu na hamwe bugaragara kdi ntibigire aho byacitse bikomeye mu mpande zabyo. Ariko ibyo ntibikurikizwa ku binyabiziga bikurikira:
fields.choice1_text: ibinyabiziga bidapakiye kdi bitajya birenza umuvuduko wa km 25 mu isaha ahateganye
fields.choice2_text: ibinyabiziga bya police bijya ahatarenga km 25 uvuye aho biba
fields.choice3_text: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri

fields.question_text: Birabujijwe kugenza ibinyabiziga bigendeshwa na moteri na za romoruki zikururwa nabyo, iyo ibiziga byambaye inziga zidahagwa cyangwa inziga zikururuka zifite umubyimba uri hasi ya cm 4. Ariko ibyo ntibikurikizwa ku binyabiziga bikurikira:
fields.choice2_text: ibinyabiziga bihinga iyo bigendeshwa mu karere katarenga km 25 uvuye aho ziba

fields.question_text: Imirongo yera iteganye n’umurongo ugabanya umuhanda mo kabiri mu burebure bwawo ugaragaza:
Iyo harimo indi myanya birabujijwe gutwara ku ntebe y’imbere y’imodoka abana badafite imyaka ikurikira:

Ku mihanda yagenwe na minisitiri ubifite mu nshingano ibyapa biburira n’ibyapa byerekana bigomba kugaragazwa kuva bwije kugera bukeye n’urumuri rwihariye cyangwa amatara ku mihanda cyangwa ibintu ngarurarumuri. Igihe ijuru rikeye intera y’ahagaragara igomba kuba nibura:

Ibizirikisho by’iminyururu cyangwa by’insinga kimwe n’ibindi by’ingoboka bikoreshwa gusa igihe nta kundi umuntu yabigenza kandi nta kindi bigiriwe uretse gusa kugirango ikinyabiziga kigere aho kigomba gukorerwa kandi nturenze na rimwe km 20 mu isaha, ibyo bizirikisho bigaragazwa ku buryo bukurikira:
fields.choice3_text: icyapa cyera cya mpande enye zingana gifite cm 30 kuri buri ruhande

fields.question_text: Uretse mu mijyi, kuyindi mihanda yagenywe na minisiteri ushinzwe gutwara ibintu n’abantu, uburemere ntarengwa bwemewe ku binyabiziga bifatanye bifite imitambiko itatu ni:
Uretse mu mujyi kuyindi mihanda yajyenwe na minisitiri ushinzwe gutwara abantu n’ibintu, uburemere ntarengwa ku binyabiziga bifite imitambiko itatu cyangwa irenga hatarimo mukuzungu ni :
Iyo nta mategeko awugabanya by’umwihariko umuvuduko ntarengwa ku modoka zidafite ibizibuza kwiceka kuberako ariko zakozwe ni:
Iyo nta mategeko awugabanya by’umwihariko umuvuduko ntarengwa ku modoka zidafite ibizibuza kwiceka kuberako ariko zakozwe ni:
Ikinyabiziga kibujijwe guhagarara akanya kanini aha hakurikira :
fields.choice1_text: imbere y’ahantu nyabagendwa hinjirwa n’ahasohokerwa n’abantu benshi
fields.choice2_text: mu muhanda aho ugabanyijemo ibisate bigaragazwa n’imirongo icagaguye
fields.choice3_text: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri

fields.question_text:
Iyo kuva bwije kugeza bukeye cyangwa bitewe n’uko ibihe bimeze nk’igihe cy’ibihu cyangwa cy’imvura bitagishoboka kubona neza muri m 200, udutsiko twose tw’abanyamaguru nk’imperekerane cyangwa udutsiko tw’abanyeshuri bari ku murongo bayobowe n’umwarimu, 
iyo bagenda mu muhanda ku isonga hakaba hari abantu barenze umwe bagomba kugaragazwa kuburyo bukurikira:
fields.choice1_text: imbere ni itara ry’umuhondo ritwariwe ibumoso
fields.choice2_text: inyuma ni itara ryumutuku ritwariwe ibumoso n’umuntu uri ku murongo w’inyuma hafi y’umurongo ugabanya umuhanda mo kabiri
fields.choice3_text: A na B ni ibisubizo by’ukuri

fields.question_text: Imburira zimurika zemerewe gukoreshwa kugirango bamenyeshe umuyobozi ko bagiye kumunyuraho aha hakurikira:
Ibinyabiziga bifite ubugari bufite ibipimo bikurikira bigomba kugira amatara ndangaburumbarare
Nta tara na rimwe cyangwa akagarurarumuri bishobora kuba bifunze kuburyo igice cyabyo cyo hasi cyane kimurika kiba kiri hasi y’ibipimo bikurikira kuva ku butaka igihe ikinyabiziga kidapakiye:
Ahari hejuru cyane y’ubuso bumurika h’amatara ndangambere na ndanganyuma ntihashobora kuba aharenze ibipimo bikurikira hejuru y’ubutaka iyo ikinyabiziga kidapakiye:

Buri modoka cyangwa buri romoruki ikuruwe n’iyo modoka bishobora kugira itara risa n’icyatsi kibisi bituma umuyobozi yerekana ko yabonye ikimenyetso cy’uwitegura kumunyuraho. Iryo tara rigomba gushyirwa aha hakurikira:

Ubugari bw’imizigo yikorewe n’ipikipiki ifite akanyabiziga ko kuruhande kimwe n’ubwa romoruki ikuruwe na bene icyo kinyabiziga ntibushobora kurenza ibipimo bikurikira ku bugari bw’icyo kinyabiziga kidapakiye:
Mu gihe telefone yawe ihamagawe utwaye imodoka   wakora iki?
fields.choice4_text: B na c ni ibisubizo byukuri

fields.question_text: Niki wakora mbere y’uko uhindura icyerekezo?
fields.choice1_text: Gutanga ikimenyetso cy’ukuboko no gukoresha amatara ndangacyerekezo.
fields.choice2_text: Itegereze neza niba icyapa kikwemerera guhindura icyerekezo.

fields.question_text: Niki muribi wakwirinda mugihe ushaka kunyuranaho?
fields.choice1_text: Nyuma y’ikona ugategereza kubona uburyo bwo kunyuranaho.
fields.choice3_text: Aho utagomba kurenza ibirometero 30 mu isaha.

fields.question_text: Niki wakora mugihe usanze mu bimenyetso bimurika harimo ibara ry’umuhondo.
Mugihe ukurikiranye na romoruki,n’ukubera iki ugomba gusiga umwanya uhagije hagati yawe nayo?
fields.choice2_text: Bifasha umuyobozi wa romoruki kukurebera mundorerwamo.

fields.question_text: Utegereje gukata iburyo kwiherezo ry’umuhanda. ukingirijwe nimodoka ihagaze.niki wakora?
fields.choice1_text: Guhagarara hanyuma ukagenda gake gake witonze kugezaho ureba neza.
fields.choice2_text: Kwihuta wegera imbere aho ushobora kureba ugafunga ikindi cyerekezo.
fields.choice3_text: Gutegereza abanyamaguru bakakumenyesha ko ntakibazo wakata.
fields.choice4_text: Guhindukiza imodoka vuba kugirango ushake indi nzira wakoresha.

fields.question_text: Mugihe uri murugendo rurerure mumuhanda urombereje w’ibice byinshi. niki wakora mugihe wumva utangiye kugira ibitotsi?
fields.choice2_text: Kwihuta cyane kugirango usoze urugendo vuba.
fields.choice3_text: Kuva mumuhanda urombereje w’ibice byinshi, ugahagarara ahantu hatekanye.

fields.question_text: Kuki ugomba gucana amatara mugihe hatangiye kwijima?
fields.choice3_text: Kugira ngo ujyane nabandi bayobozi bibinyabiziga.
fields.choice4_text: Kuko amatara yo ku muhanda ari kwaka

fields.question_text: Urimo kugenda munzira nyabagendwa ni gute wanyura k’umuyobozi w’igare?
Niki wakora igihe utabona neza usubira inyuma?
fields.choice3_text: Gushaka umuntu uri hanze y’ikinyabiziga  ukuyobora

fields.question_text: Igihe ukurikiwe n’ikinyabiziga gitwara abarwayi gicanye amatara y’intabaza arabagirana.Wakora iki?
fields.choice1_text: Kugihigamira ako kanya ndetse byaba ngombwa ugahagarara

fields.question_text: Wifuza kugana ibumoso imbere yawe. kubera iki ushaka umwanya mwiza kandi uhagije?
fields.choice2_text: Kugirango ubone neza ikindi kerekezo ushaka gufata
fields.choice3_text: Kugirango ufashe abandi bose bakoresha umuhanda icyo ushaka gukora
fields.choice4_text: Kwemerera abandi bayobozi b’ibinyabiziga  kukunyura muruhande rw’ibumoso

fields.question_text: Utwaye ikinyabiziga inyuma ya romoruki. umuyobozi wayo akaguha ikimenyetso cyo kumutambukaho iburyo kandi ugana  ibumoso, wakora iki ?
fields.choice4_text: Kugumana umuvuduko wari ufite ukamuvugiriza ihoni

fields.question_text: Wegereye inzira y’abanyamaguru ugasanga bategereje kwambuka. Ugomba gukora iki?
fields.choice1_text: Kureka abakuze n’abafite ubumuga bagatambuka mbere

fields.question_text: Kumanywa urumuri rudahagije hatabona neza.Ni ayahe matara y’urugendo ugomba gukoresha.
fields.choice1_text: Amatara yo kubisika  na matara  kamena-bihu.

fields.question_text: Niki ugomba gukora igihe uhagaze ku muhanda igihe cy’ibihu?
fields.choice2_text: Kureka amatara yo k,ubisikana na kamena-bihu akaguma yaka
fields.choice3_text: Kureka amatara yo kubisikana akaguma yaka

fields.question_text: Inzira nyabagendwa ifite ibyerekezo bibiri, uruhande rw’ibumoso rudufasha iki ?
Ni hehe byemewe kunyuranaho munzira y’icyerekezo kimwe?

fields.choice3_text: gutwara yegera ku uruhande rw’ibumoso bw’umuhanda

fields.choice3_text: Mu gice cy’iburyo bw’umuhanda uretse igihe ashaka kunyuranaho cyangwa gukata ibumoso

fields.choice2_text: ibinyabiziga biturutse ibumoso bwe n’umuvuduko bifite n’intera iri hagati ye nabyo

fields.choice4_text: ibinyabiziga bimututse imbere , umuvuduko bifite n’intera iri hagati ye nabyo

fields.question_text: Umuyobozi w’ikinyabiziga ugendera inyuma y’ikinyabaziga gitwara abagenzi gihagaze gikuramo cyangwa gishyiramo abagenzi agomba :

Gutwara ikinyabiziga wasinze:
fields.choice3_text: birabujijwe ku binyabiziga byose bifite moteri

fields.question_text: Umuyobozi w’ikinyabizaga ashobora kunyuranaho:

fields.question_text: Ugeze ahari inzira yabanyamaguru barindiriye kwambuka. Ntibatangiye kwambuka , wakora iki?
Igihe utwaye umuntu mu kinyabiziga cyawe, akibagirwa kwambara umukandara wo kwirinda ibyago ugomba:
fields.choice1_text: gukuramo umukandara wo kwirinda ibyago wambaye mukawambara mwembi
fields.choice2_text: kubyirengagiza wizeyeko nta mpanuka muri bukore
fields.choice3_text: funga cyane umukandara wo kwirinda ibyago wawe
fields.choice4_text: Kubibutsa kwambara umukandara wo kwirinda ibyago

fields.question_text: Igihe za otobisi zigenewe gutwara banyeshuli zihagaze kugirango zibafate cyangwa bavemo ugomba :
fields.choice2_text: gukomeza ugabanyije umuvuduko n’ubwitonzi kuko bishoboka ko abanyeshuli bakwambuka bitunguranye

fields.question_text: Igihe imodoka iparitse ku nkengero z’umuhanda mugihe cy’ ijoro :
fields.choice2_text: Umuntu ufite uruhushya rwo gutwara ikinyabiziga agomba kuba yicaye mu mwanya w’umuyobozi
fields.choice3_text: Amatara yo guhagarara umwanya munini aguma yaka

fields.question_text: Mu gihe hari undi muyobozi w’ikinyabiziga ugukurikiye watangiye kukunyuraho :
fields.choice1_text: Ntugomba kugira undi muyobozi w’ikinyabiziga unyuraho
fields.choice3_text: Ugomba kunyura kukindi kinyabiziga uvugije ihoni

fields.question_text: Utwaye ikinyabiziga mu muhanda ufite ibyerekezo bibiri .ikinyabiziga imbere yawe cyiragenda buhoro, imbere yawe umuhanda nta kibazo kunyuranaho, ugomba :
fields.choice3_text: kucyinyuraho ukoresheje uruhande urwo arirwo rwose

fields.question_text: Ibice by’umuhanda byera bigari biteganye n’umurongo ugabanya umuhanda mo ,kabiri bisobanura:
Uturebanyuma dukoreshwa:
Kuki abanyamaguru batemerewe kwambuka umuhanda mw’ikoni cyangwa hafi y’imodoka ihagaze?
fields.choice3_text: Abandi bayobozi bi binyabiziga baza bashobora kutabona abambuka umuhanda

fields.question_text: Kunyuranaho mw’ikoni :
Umuyobozi w’ikinyabiziga igihe atwaye ikinyabiziga akagira umunaniro utuma yasinzira yakora iki ?
fields.choice1_text: Gufungura ikirahure cy’ikinyabiziga cyangwa gushyira ubukonje mu modoka kugirango umwuka mwiza winjire mu kinyabiziga
fields.choice2_text: Guhagarara akaruhuka harimo no kugendagenda niba bishoboka
fields.choice3_text: Kunanura amaboko no gufunga amaso mugihe gito

fields.question_text: Niki umuyobozi w’ikinyabiziga yakora igihe atwaye ikinyabiziga mugihe cy’ibihu,imvura nyinshi, umwuzure cyangwa umukungugu mwinshi ?
fields.choice1_text: Kugendera mu tuyira turi kumpande zu muhanda, ucunga ibimenyetso bigarura urumuri
fields.choice2_text: Kugabanya umuvuduko hanyuma ugakoresha amatara magufi
fields.choice3_text: Gucana amatara maremare hanyuma ukagenda gahoro
fields.choice4_text: Kugendera mu murongo ugabanya umuhanda mo kabiri unareba ibimenyestso by’umuhanda bigarura urumuri

fields.question_text: Muri ibi byapa ni ubuhe bwoko bw’ibyapa  bitegeka byo mu muhanda?
fields.choice2_text: ibiri mw’ishusho ya mpande eshatu mu n’uzenguruko mw’ibara ry’ubururu
fields.choice3_text: ibiri mw’ishusho y’uruziga n’umuzenguruko mw’ibara ry’umutuku
fields.choice4_text: ibiri mw’ishusho ya mpande enye zingana mubuso bw’umukara

fields.question_text: Ugeze mu masangano y’umuhanda aho usanga ibimenyetso bimurika bidakora, wakora iki igihe umukozi ubifiye ububasha aguhaye iki kimenyesto ?
fields.choice3_text: Guhagarara kumurongo wo guhagarara umwanya moto

fields.question_text: Amatara ndangacyerekezo agomba kugaragara nijoro igihe ijuru rikeye mu ntera nibura ya:
Umurongo ucagaguye uvuga ko buri muyobozi abujijwe kuwurenga uretse mu gihe:
fields.choice3_text: Guhindukira cyangwa kujya mukindi gice cy’umuhanda

fields.question_text: Igice cy’inzira nyabagendwa kigarukira kumirongo ibiri yera icagaguye ibangikanye kandi gifite ubugari budahagije kugirango imodoka zitambuke neza kiba ari:
fields.choice3_text: a na b byose ni ukuri

fields.question_text: Ikinyabiziga kigendeshwa na moteri n’ikinyabiziga gikururwa n’inyamaswa ntibishobora gukurura :
Utugarurarumuri turi ku ruhande rw’imbere rw’ikinyabiziga tugomba gusa:
Iyo umuhanda ugabanijemo ibisate bibiri kandi ugendwamo mu byerekezo byombi umuyobozi abujijwe :
Icyapa kimenyesha kugendera mu muhanda ubisikanirwamo gifite:
fields.choice1_text: Ishusho y’uruziga mw’ibara ritukura, ubuso bwera n’ikirango cy’umukara
fields.choice2_text: Ishusho ya mpandeshatu mw’ibara ritukura, ubuso bwera n’ikirango cy’umukara
fields.choice3_text: Ishusho ya mpandeshatu mw’ibara ritukura, ubuso bw’ubururu n’ikirango cy’umukara
fields.choice4_text: Ishusho y’uruziga mw’ibara ritukura, ubuso bw’ubururu n’ikirango cy’umukara

fields.question_text: Iki kimenyetso gitanzwe n’umukozi ubifitiye ububasha cyo guhagarara :
fields.choice1_text: ku bakoresha umuhanda ba muturutse imbere
fields.choice2_text: ku bakoresha umuhanda bose bamuturutse imbere n’inyuma

fields.question_text: Umuhanda urombereje w’ibice byinshi. Ndashaka kunyura kuri izi kamyo ibyiri mugihe gito ibumoso icyarimwe , biremewe ?
Ndashaka gukata iburyo. Biremewe ?
Umuhanda wambukiranya inzira ya gariyamoshi
fields.choice1_text: nshobora gukomeza nkambuka umuhanda kubera ko uruzitiro rufunguye
fields.choice2_text: ngomba guhagarara munsi yitara ry’umutuku rimyatsa
fields.choice3_text: ntabwo nakomeza urugendo rwanjye. Ngomba gihita mpagarara

fields.question_text: Mpagaze mu murongo wo guhagarara umwanya muto
Ndashaka kugata ibumoso. Imodoka y’icyatsi yaje irahagarara. Ninde ufite uburenganzira bwo gutambuka mbere?
fields.choice2_text: imodoka y’icyatsi ifite uburenganzira bwo gutambuka mbere
fields.choice3_text: twembi ntaburenganzira bwo gutambuka mbere gusa tugomba gutambukana ubwitonzi

fields.question_text: Mfite uburenganzira bwo gutambuka muri iri sangano ?
Ndi kumuvuduko wa 20km/h. nshobora gukomeza muri iri sangano ry’umuhanda?
fields.choice3_text: yego, nshobora guta ibumoso cyangwa iburyo

fields.question_text: Umuyobozi wikinyabiziga aritegura kunyuraho ibumoso :
fields.choice3_text: nshobora kumunyura nciye ibumoso ariko mbonye ko mfite umwanya uhagije

fields.question_text: Iki kimenyetso kiri mu muhanda kivuze iki ?
fields.choice3_text: Wegereye icyapa cyo guhagarara umwanya muto

fields.question_text: Iki kimenyetso kiri mu muhanda kivuze iki ?
fields.choice1_text: Umuyobozi abujijwe kurenga umurongo wera ucagaguye cyeretse mugihe bitateza icyago
fields.choice3_text: Biremewe kunyuranaho ariko nturenge umurongo wera ucagaguye

fields.question_text: Mu gihe utwaye ikinyabiziga uva kuri A ugana kuri B, Iki kimenyetso kiri mu muhanda kivuze iki ?
fields.choice1_text: Umuyobozi ashobora kurenga umurongo wera udacagaguye mugihe cyo guhindukira gusa
fields.choice2_text: Umuyobozi w’ikinyabiziga abujijwe kunyuranaho, uretse gusa abayobozi b’ibinyamitende nibo bashobora kurenga umurongo wera udacagaguye
fields.choice3_text: Umuyobozi w’ikinyabiziga abujijwe kunyuranaho arenze umurongo wera udacagaguye
fields.choice4_text: Umuyobozi w’ikinyabiziga ashobora kunyuranaho mu gihe bitateza icyago

fields.question_text: Mu gihe utwaye ikinyabiziga uva kuri A ugana kuri B, Iki kimenyetso kiri mu muhanda kivuze iki ?
fields.choice1_text: Umuyobozi w’ikinyabiziga ashobora kunyuranaho arenze umurongo wera udacagaguye
fields.choice2_text: Umuyobozi w’ikinyabiziga abujijwe kunyuranaho arenze imirongo yera
fields.choice4_text: Abayobozi b’ibinyamitende gusa bemerewe kunyuranaho barenze umurongo wera udacagaguye
